text: You’ve seen these cult-favorite products on every blog and read the reviews on every forum. The only thing left to do is give them a try for yourself. Finding the right skincare routine for you takes lots of trial and error, so start with a sample set first. If you love the products, go back and buy the jumbo sizes, and if you don’t love them, well, at least you didn’t waste a ton of money.
authors: Brooke Shunatona Is A Contributing Writer For Cosmopolitan.Com.
title: Valentine's Day Gifts You Should Give Yourself — Best Beauty Gifts

meta_data.sailthru.excerpt: The candy and card companies would have you believe that February is the time of year to focus on relationships—and what relationship is more important than the one you have with yourself, amirite?! This Valentine’s Day, shower your own damn self with love, affection, and a few luxurious beauty gifts,...
